1520300.name: Theropods Demo
1520300.description:
AN ADVENTURE LOST IN TIME

Theropods is a point and click adventure game that combines puzzles with a cinematic story, colourful characters and a retro aesthetic. Oh, and lots of dinosaurs!

Travel back to the time when dinosaurs ruled the world and (a little less further back) when adventure games ruled the gaming world! Immerse yourself in a vast, prehistoric world full of dinosaurs, constructed with love, PIXEL BY PIXEL.

FEATURES

HANDCRAFTED, PIXEL BY PIXEL

Relive the golden age of adventure games with stunning, hand-drawn pixel art. Every character, dinosaur, and environment is brought to life with frame-by-frame animations, made with care and a lot of heart.

A THRILLING STORY WITH FASCINATING CHARACTERS

Follow the journey of a fearless young hunter determined to rescue her enslaved tribe from a brutal band of barbarians. Meet a stranded spaceman, stuck on a strange prehistoric planet, desperately seeking a way home.

Together, they’ll forge unlikely friendships, face betrayal and discover the courage it takes to survive in a world of danger and wonder.

DIVE INTO A TEXT-FREE EXPERIENCE

Inspired by games like Machinarium and Gobliiins, Theropods tells its story without traditional dialogue or text.

Through expressive grunts, nuanced animations, and clever visual storytelling, you’ll be fully immersed in this prehistoric adventure.



No words, just pure gameplay and creative problem-solving!

A TOUCH OF SCI-FI

What happens when cutting-edge tech collides with a land ruled by dinosaurs? 

From glowing energy pods to high-tech gadgets, the blend of sci-fi elements with prehistoric chaos creates a world unlike anything you’ve seen before.
